content.question: The third paragraph asserts that letter writing was significant because it

choices.label: provided women with a means of exercising power as individuals
caused women to feel resentment for the roles they were forced to assume
presented women with the opportunity to become professional writers
gave women a vehicle for building close personal relationships

content.answer: provided women with a means of exercising power as individuals

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
